Name: TacitRedThreatIntelligence
Author: Data443 Risk Mitigation, Inc. - support@data443.com
Description: The [TacitRed Compromised Credentials](https://data443.com/tacitred-attack-surface-intelligence/) solution integrates TacitRed's compromised credential and identity threat intelligence into Microsoft Sentinel using the Codeless Connector Framework (CCF). The solution deploys a REST API poller connector, a custom log table (TacitRed_Findings_CL), analytics rule, and visualization workbook to help security teams detect and investigate credential compromise.
WorkbookDescription: This workbook provides SecOps visibility into TacitRed compromised credential findings, including breach trends, domain analysis, and credential exposure metrics.
